Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.08.2014 SH SCR19054 Extended final update of SBUY_RELOADAFTERUATREFRESH = N with updates SBUY_SENDTODEMICA/SSAT_SENDTODEMICA
to achieve sending only test suppliers, only defined in UAT, to Demica
16.04.2014 SH SCR18364 Added deletion of dummy SBUY rows at the end of the program
09.04.2014 SH SCR18364 Added logic to skip module MergeID(s) after a crash in the ReloadData part when BSF201 is
03.03.2014 SH SCR18364 Set SBUY_RELOADAFTERUATREFRESH = N at the end of the program for all SBUY rows
-- Set variables, used for debug purposes and to add infos to job log

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/SBUY where exists(select * from :2/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'SBUY' and DBME_ID_NEW = SBUY_NO) for fetch only

Text.val: -- ID's are already merged (in case of crashes in the reload data part the merge of ID's has to be skipped)
-- First delete all rows from table FLPROD.DBME
-- Then start populating table FLPROD.DBME with old ID(s) from FLUATSAVE database tables
... add column(s) to be updated
... set SBUY_RELOADAFTERUATREFRESH = N, to prevent off-/reloading SCF data every time, has to be always set manually
before a UAT database restore
... set flag to send supplier data to Demica only for offloaded/reloaded suppliers (test suppliers on UAT)
... replace variables %1 = FLPROD %2 = FLUATSAVE
... in case of table SBUY add qualifier to achieve where clause (exists in FLUATSAVE) working
-- Insert/Update statements
-- In case of big tables (e.g. CLNT), we cannot pass the whole Insert statement through
gateway/easycom because of 32kB limitation of parameter (max. size 32kB of statement in DB SQL box)
So remaining fields are updated separately via Update statement
.. in case of very big tables (for the future) a second part with Update statement cycles
is performed
-- Create Insert statement, until size of 15kB (= 30 kB) )else continue with Update statement
(Easycom gateway only supports parameters <= 32kB, so for big tables remaining)
columns which cannnot be set via Insert statement have to be updated with separate Update
-- 1. Block to define columns for Update statement block, untile size of 15 kB
-- 2. Block to define columns for Update statement block
